adHeader: Marble & Granite Slab Fabrication/Install - Cutting Polishing Drilling
adDetails: 30 years experience. Installation of pre-edged kitchen and bathroom countertops (and backsplashes). Commonly referred to as "Chinese Pre-cuts" Small jobs prefered. Bullnosing or simple flat polishing of tile edges. Re-finishing/ re-polishing. Re-sealing (against stains) / color enhancing. Top mount and under mount sinks. Drilling of faucet or mounting holes. In-house (only) tile saw use/rental.
